data.title: Estonia’s New Premier Forms Coalition, Ushering in Defense Tax
data.meta_description: Estonia’s incoming prime minister, Kristen Michal, sealed a coalition agreement as he unveiled a new defense tax that aims to shore up deterrence to Russia.
data.text:
Outgoing Prime Minister Kallas becomes EU’s top diplomat

Leaders plan defense levy to shore up ammunition stockpiles

Estonia’s incoming prime minister, Kristen Michal , sealed a coalition agreement as he unveiled a new defense tax that aims to shore up deterrence to Russia.

The alliance — made up of Michal’s free-market Reform Party, the progressive Estonia 200 and the Social Democrats — is a continuation of the political team led by outgoing Prime Minister Kaja Kallas , who resigned to become the European Union’s top diplomat.
